name: pipedream
title: Pipedream
description: Manage Pipedream workflows with AI-powered error analysis. Connect, monitor, and optimize your workflows directly from Raycast.
author: olekristianbe

commands.name: connect-workflow
commands.title: Connect Workflow
commands.subtitle: Pipedream
commands.description: Connect an existing Pipedream workflow to manage

commands.name: manage-workflows
commands.title: Manage Workflows
commands.subtitle: Pipedream
commands.description: View, manage, sort, and filter your saved Pipedream workflows

commands.name: menu-bar-workflows
commands.title: Show in Menu Bar
commands.subtitle: Pipedream
commands.description: Display workflow status, error counts, and quick actions in the menu bar

commands.name: workflow-analytics
commands.title: Workflow Analytics
commands.subtitle: Pipedream
commands.description: View detailed analytics, metrics, and performance data for your workflows. Includes AI-powered error analysis for intelligent insights.

preferences.name: PIPEDREAM_API_KEY
preferences.title: Pipedream API Key
preferences.description: Requires a Pipedream account. Generate your API key at https://pipedream.com/settings/user and enter it here.

preferences.name: DEFAULT_SORT
preferences.title: Default Sort Order
preferences.description: Choose how workflows are sorted by default

preferences.name: DEFAULT_FILTER
preferences.title: Default Filter
preferences.description: Choose the initial filter view for workflows

preferences.name: REFRESH_INTERVAL_SECONDS
preferences.title: Refresh Interval
preferences.description: How often to update error counts in the background
